mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT_REVIEW (ID, PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{memberId}, #{reviewStar}, #{reviewContent})
mapper.select: SELECT TPR.ID, TPR.PRODUCT_ID, TPR.MEMBER_ID, TPR.REVIEW_STAR, TPR.REVIEW_CONTENT, TPM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TPM.MEMBER_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_PRODUCT_REVIEW TPR JOIN TBL_MEMBER TPM ON TPM.ID = TPR.MEMBER_ID WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT_REVIEW SET REVIEW_STAR = #{reviewStar}, REVIEW_DATE = #{reviewDate}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}
